mapper.select: INSERT INTO userlist_has_user SELECT (SELECT DISTINCT chatlistid FROM chatlist WHERE myid = #{myId}), #{friendId} WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM chatlist WHERE chatlist.myid = #{myId} AND chatlist.friendid = #{friendId} )

SELECT u.userid id, u.username name, u.useravatar avatar, (select COUNT(m.msgid) from message m where m.senderid = friendid and m.receiverid = myid)unReadNum FROM chatlist JOIN user u ON chatlist.friendid = u.userid WHERE myid = #{userId} ORDER BY unReadNum DESC
